title: Keep recognized-but-disabled feature macro values deterministic
source:
#if !defined(__OBJC3_FEATURE_DERIVES_MACROS__)
#error "missing feature-recognition macro"
#endif
#if __OBJC3_FEATURE_DERIVES_MACROS__ != 0
#error "recognized-but-disabled feature macro must be 0"
#endif
int ftm50_disabled_feature_value(void) { return __OBJC3_FEATURE_DERIVES_MACROS__; }
